name: Righteous Quest
description:
Title:  Righteous Quest

Platform: Web

Genre: Text Adventure

Rating: M

Target Market: Fantasy Enthusiast 

Game Overview: You are on a quest to either bring your former order back to the glory of your god, or to smite the members of it in a zealous rage.

Instructions: Download the print to play instructions for more information

Game Design Team: Sebastien – Game Designer
